sourcesContent:
import Carousel from "react-elastic-carousel"; const CarouselDesign = ({data}) => { const breakPoints = [ { width: 1, itemsToShow: 1, itemsToScroll:1}, { width: 550, itemsToShow: 2, itemsToScroll:2}, { width: 850, itemsToShow: 3, itemsToScroll:3}, { width: 1150, itemsToShow: 4, itemsToScroll:4}, { width: 1450, itemsToShow: 5, itemsToScroll:5}, { width: 1750, itemsToShow: 6, itemsToScroll:6}, ]; const base_url = 'https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500'; return (
{data && data.map((element)=>

{element.title}

{element.vote_count/1000+"k"}
{new Date(element.release_date).toDateString().slice(11,15)}
)}
); } export default CarouselDesign;
